name: Animal Kingdom: Coin Raid
description:
Join thousands of players around the globe to the addictive adventure game of Animal Kingdom. In this game, you'll have the chance to attack, raid, and steal gold coins from different islands and gamers. Are you ready to explore the mysterious treasure islands?




Do you have what it takes to be the next king of the Animal Kingdom and lead the leaderboard? Are you brave enough to defeat attacks, master island challenges, and steal coins from other players?




Download Animal Kingdom for FREE, play with your Facebook friends and start your next addictive adventure game NOW! Whether you're looking for a casual, adventure, or raid game, Animal Kingdom is a game you can't miss!





● EXPLORE THE KINGDOM & BUILD UNIQUE ISLANDS
Building bridges, stealing treasures from other players and collecting animal cards will allow you to progress and explore the Animal Kingdom. As you progress to new islands, you'll need to build unique structures, defend your island from raids, and master your gaming skills.



● STEAL & RAID TO BECOME THE NEXT COIN MASTER
Win coins, cash and gems by stealing and raiding other players from around the world. Join the treasure raid, attack and ruin different islands or play guessing games where you can reveal cards that will help you win the big jackpot and explore in our animal adventure game!



● PLAY AGAINST YOUR FACEBOOK FRIENDS
Attack islands of other players online, steal gold coins and defend your island from ongoing attacks. Looking for revenge? You can raid players who attacked your island and steal their gold coins and treasures back!




● COLLECT ANIMAL CHARACTER CARDS
Explore the islands in this animal adventure game and find unique animal cards that will help you complete different card collections. Once you finish the collection of all the cads, you’ll win amazing prices including gold coins, gems and exclusive power-ups!




Like to play multiplayer addictive islands games where you can attack other players online, loot different islands, defend your island, gain millions of coins by attacking your friends? You’d love to play Animal Kingdom Treasure Raid! PLAY NOW!





HOW TO PLAY ANIMAL KINGDOM?
- Tap and hold to build a bridge
- Release to drop the bridge onto the adjacent platform. Hold for the perfect duration to earn extra cool rewards, coins, gems and more
- Earn gold coins from each successful bridge to spend on gear for your island
- Collect all animals, conquer the Animal Kingdom Island and become the king of the island!
